title: Media information
description: Media context information for content related interactions.

xdm:mediaTimed.title: Timed media information
xdm:mediaTimed.description: Information related to timed media main content, such as ads and chapters.

xdm:primaryAssetReference.title: Primary asset reference
xdm:primaryAssetReference.description: Asset information about the main content that was played, present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content's playback.

@id.title: Asset ID
@id.description: Identifier of the content, which can be used to tie back to other industry or CMS IDs.

dc:title.title: Content name
dc:title.description: The friendly, human-readable name of the timed media asset.

id3:Audio.title: Audio
id3:Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

xmpDM:artist.title: Artist
xmpDM:artist.description: The name of the album artist or group performing the music recording or video.

xmpDM:album.title: Album
xmpDM:album.description: The name of the album that the music recording or video belongs to.

xdm:Audio.title: Audio
xdm:Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

xmpDM:artist.title: Artist
xmpDM:artist.description: The name of the album artist or group performing the music recording or video.

xmpDM:album.title: Album
xmpDM:album.description: The name of the album that the music recording or video belongs to.

id3:Audio.title: Audio
id3:Audio.description: Metadata specific to audio content (record label, radio station, etc.).

xmpDM:duration.title: Media content length
xmpDM:duration.description: Length of primary media asset in seconds.

xdm:showType.title: Show type
xdm:showType.description: The type of content for example, trailer or full episode.

iptc4xmpExt:Series.title: Series
iptc4xmpExt:Series.description: The series the show belongs to.

xdm:streamFormat.title: Stream format
xdm:streamFormat.description: Free-form format of the stream for example, short or long.

xdm:streamType.title: Stream type
xdm:streamType.description: The type of the media stream

meta:enum.audio: An audio stream (e.g. podcast, audiobook, radio stream).
meta:enum.video: A video stream (e.g. Video-On-Demand, live event stream, downloaded movie).

iptc4xmpExt:Season.title: Season
iptc4xmpExt:Season.description: The season the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Episode.title: Episode
iptc4xmpExt:Episode.description: The episode the show belongs to.

iptc4xmpExt:Genre.title: Genre
iptc4xmpExt:Genre.description: Type or grouping of content as defined by content producer.

iptc4xmpExt:Rating.title: Content rating
iptc4xmpExt:Rating.description: The rating as defined by Parental Guidelines.

iptc4xmpExt:Creator.title: Creator
iptc4xmpExt:Creator.description: Party or parties including person or organization which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.

xdm:firstAirDate.title: First air date
xdm:firstAirDate.description: The date when the content first aired on television.

xmpDM:releaseDate.title: First digital date
xmpDM:releaseDate.description: The date when the content first aired on any digital channel or platform.

xdm:primaryAssetViewDetails.title: Primary asset view details
xdm:primaryAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the main content playback, present on all ads and chapters that occur during the content's playback.

@id.title: Media session ID
@id.description: Identifies an instance of a content stream unique to an individual playback.

xdm:videoSegment.title: Video segment
xdm:videoSegment.description: The interval that describes the part of the content that has been viewed in minutes.

xdm:path.title: Video path
xdm:path.description: The path to the video in the app or site.

xdm:broadcastChannel.title: Content channel
xdm:broadcastChannel.description: Distribution channel from where the content was played.

xdm:broadcastContentType.title: Broadcast content type
xdm:broadcastContentType.description: The type of the stream delivery.

meta:enum.Linear: Linear playback of the media asset

xdm:playerSDKVersion.title: Player SDK version
xdm:playerSDKVersion.description: The SDK version used by the player.

xdm:vhlVersion.title: VHL version
xdm:vhlVersion.description: The Media SDK version used for the tracking session.

xdm:adLoadType.title: Ad load type
xdm:adLoadType.description: The type of ad loaded as defined by each customer's internal representation.

xdm:sourceFeed.title: Feed type
xdm:sourceFeed.description: The type of feed, which can either represent actual feed-related data such as  EAST HD or SD, or the source of the feed like a URL.

xdm:sessionTimeout.title: Media session server timeout
xdm:sessionTimeout.description: Indicates the amount of time, in seconds, that passed between the user's last known interaction and the moment the session was closed.

xdm:qoe.title: Quality of experience
xdm:qoe.description: Timed media properties related to the content playback's quality of experience (QoE).

xdm:errors.title: Errors
xdm:errors.description: The number of errors that were encountered during playback.

xdm:buffers.title: Buffer events
xdm:buffers.description: The number of buffer states that occurred during a playback session.

xdm:bufferTime.title: Total buffer duration
xdm:bufferTime.description: Describes the total amount of time in seconds, spent buffering.

xdm:bufferImpactedStreams.title: Buffer impacted streams
xdm:bufferImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by buffering.

xdm:stalls.title: Stalling events
xdm:stalls.description: The number of stall states that occurred during a playback session.

xdm:stallTime.title: Total stalling duration
xdm:stallTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which the playback was stalled during playback.

xdm:stallingImpactedStreams.title: Stalling impacted streams
xdm:stallingImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by stalling.

xdm:bitrateChanges.title: Bitrate changes
xdm:bitrateChanges.description: The number of bitrate change events that occurred during a playback session.

xdm:bitrateAverage.title: Average bitrate
xdm:bitrateAverage.description: A weighted average of all bitrate values related to the play duration that occurred during a playback session.

xdm:bitrateAverageBucket.title: Average bitrate bucket
xdm:bitrateAverageBucket.description: The average bitrate (in kbps). The value is predefined buckets at 100kbps intervals.

xdm:bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.title: Bitrate change impacted streams
xdm:bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which bitrate changes occurred.

xdm:droppedFrames.title: Dropped frames
xdm:droppedFrames.description: The number of frames dropped during playback of the main content.

xdm:droppedFrameImpactedStreams.title: Dropped frame impacted streams
xdm:droppedFrameImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which frames were dropped.

xdm:dropBeforeStarts.title: Drops before starts
xdm:dropBeforeStarts.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

xdm:timeToStart.title: Time to start
xdm:timeToStart.description: Describes the duration (in seconds) passed between video load and start.

xdm:playerSdkErrors.title: Player SDK Error IDs
xdm:playerSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Player.

xdm:mediaSdkErrors.title: Media SDK Error IDs
xdm:mediaSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Media SDK.

xdm:externalSdkErrors.title: External Error IDs
xdm:externalSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated outside the Player or SDK.

xdm:errorImpactedStreams.title: Error impacted streams
xdm:errorImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which an error event occurred.

xdm:downloadedPlayback.title: Media downloaded flag
xdm:downloadedPlayback.description: The stream was played locally on the device after being downloaded.

xdm:fullScreen.title: Full screen
xdm:fullScreen.description: Timed media properties related to full screen player state.

xdm:playerStateSet.title: Player state set
xdm:playerStateSet.description: Whether or not the player state is set on that state.

xdm:playerStateCount.title: Player state count
xdm:playerStateCount.description: The number of times that player state was set on the stream.

xdm:playerStateTime.title: Player state time
xdm:playerStateTime.description: The total duration of that player state.

xdm:mute.title: Mute
xdm:mute.description: Timed media properties related to mute player state.

xdm:closeCaption.title: Close caption
xdm:closeCaption.description: Timed media properties related to close caption player state.

xdm:pictureInPicture.title: Picture in picture
xdm:pictureInPicture.description: Timed media properties related to picture in picture player state.

xdm:inFocus.title: In focus
xdm:inFocus.description: Timed media properties related to in focus player state.

xdm:chapterAssetReference.title: Chapter asset reference
xdm:chapterAssetReference.description: Asset information about the chapter captured by the experience event.

dc:title.title: Chapter name
dc:title.description: The friendly name of the chapter and or segment.

xmpDM:duration.title: Chapter length or duration
xmpDM:duration.description: The length of the chapter, in seconds.

xdm:chapterAssetViewDetails.title: Chapter view details
xdm:chapterAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the chapter playback captured by the experience event.

xdm:index.title: Chapter position
xdm:index.description: The index of the chapter inside the content.

xdm:offset.title: Chapter offset
xdm:offset.description: The offset of the chapter, in seconds, inside the content from the start.

xdm:impressions.title: Chapter starts
xdm:impressions.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

xdm:completes.title: Chapter completes
xdm:completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Chapter time spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time in seconds spent by a user on a specific timed media asset.

xdm:federated.title: Chapter federated
xdm:federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through data federation or data sharing.

xdm:downloadedPlayback.title: Chapter downloaded flag
xdm:downloadedPlayback.description: Set to true when the hit is generated due to playing a downloaded chapter content session.

xdm:impressions.title: Media starts
xdm:impressions.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

xdm:completes.title: Content completes
xdm:completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion, this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Content time spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: The amount of time spent in seconds by a user on a specific timed media asset.

xdm:federated.title: Media federated
xdm:federated.description: Indicates the experience event was created through data federation or data sharing.

xdm:starts.title: Content starts
xdm:starts.description: Indicates the first frame of the timed media asset has been viewed for example, the viewer did not abandon during pre-roll ad, or buffering.

xdm:mediaSegmentViews.title: Media segment views
xdm:mediaSegmentViews.description: Indicates when at least one frame, not necessarily the first has been viewed.

xdm:dropBeforeStarts.title: Drops before starts
xdm:dropBeforeStarts.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

xdm:totalTimePlayed.title: Media Time Spent
xdm:totalTimePlayed.description: Describes the total amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset, which includes time spent watching ads.

xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.title: Unique Time Played
xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.description: Describes the sum of the unique intervals seen by a user on a timed media asset - i.e. the length playback intervals viewed multiple times are only counted once.

xdm:averageMinuteAudience.title: Average Minute Audience
xdm:averageMinuteAudience.description: Describes the average content time spent for a specific media item - i.e. the total content time spent divided by the length for all of the playback sessions.

xdm:adCount.title: Ad count
xdm:adCount.description: The number of ads started during the playback.

xdm:chapterCount.title: Chapter count
xdm:chapterCount.description: The number of chapters started during the playback.

xdm:progress10.title: 10% Progress marker
xdm:progress10.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 10% marker of media based on stream length. The marker is only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress25.title: 25% Progress marker
xdm:progress25.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 25% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress50.title: 50% Progress marker
xdm:progress50.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 50% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress75.title: 75% Progress marker
xdm:progress75.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 75% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:progress95.title: 95% Progress marker
xdm:progress95.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 95% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:resumes.title: Content resumes
xdm:resumes.description: Marks each playback that was resumed after more than 30 minutes of buffer, pause, or stall period.

xdm:estimatedStreams.title: Estimated streams
xdm:estimatedStreams.description: The estimated number of video or audio streams per each individual content.

xdm:pauseImpactedStreams.title: Pause impacted streams
xdm:pauseImpactedStreams.description: Indicates if one or more pauses occurred during the playback of a single media item.

xdm:pauses.title: Pause events
xdm:pauses.description: The number of pause periods that occurred during playback.

xdm:pauseTime.title: Total pause duration
xdm:pauseTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which playback was paused by the user.

xdm:idp.title: MVPD Identifier
xdm:idp.description: The MVPD (Multichannel Video Programming Distributor) provided via authentication. [https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=MVPD]

xdm:mediaAuth.title: Media authorized
xdm:mediaAuth.description: The user has been authorized via authentication.

xdm:dayPart.title: Day part
xdm:dayPart.description: Defines the time of the day when the content was broadcast or played.
